Lyric:

[00:11.300]So what? I don't mind
[00:15.920]You kill the lights, I'll draw the blinds
[00:19.600]Don't dull the sparkle in your eyes

[00:26.340]So what? I don't mind
[00:31.140]Are you gonna stay the night
[00:34.640]Are you gonna stay the night
